title: Legacy Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Legacy Executive Assistant (Remote, Full-Time)

About Us:
WASHINGTON CONSTRUCTION is a well-established construction and renovation company serving Western Washington. We are seeking a reliable, detail-oriented Legacy Executive Assistant to support our owner/manager with daily administrative tasks and communications.

Key Responsibilities:

- Manage calendars and schedule appointments
- Screen emails, organize digital files, and assist with document preparation
- Help coordinate meetings and follow-ups with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers and clients
- Prepare simple reports, letters, and basic spreadsheets
- Perform light research, data entry, and maintain company records
- Assist with reminders, tasks, and day-to-day organization

Requirements:

- At least 1–2 years of experience as an executive, administrative, or virtual assistant (remote experience preferred)
- Good written and spoken English (upper intermediate or higher)
- Proficiency with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail, Calendar) and/or MS Office
- Detail-oriented, organized, and reliable
- Able to work independently with minimal supervision
- Construction or real estate admin experience a plus, but not required

How to Apply (ALL Steps Required):

1. Update your onlinejobs.ph profile:

- Upload proof of your IQ score (120+) from a recognized test provider (such as TestGorilla, Mensa, or similar) to your onlinejobs.ph profile.
- Update your English level to C1 or higher (include proof if possible, such as IELTS, TOEFL, or Cambridge).

2. Send your application:

   - Submit your resume and a brief introduction describing your admin experience and why you’d be a good fit for this role.

3. Complete BOTH required online assessments:
   *(Use the same email address as your onlinejobs.ph profile for both tests. Only candidates who complete both will be considered.)*

   - [Legacy Executive Assistant Assessment – Part 1](Upgrade to see actual info)
   - [Legacy Executive Assistant Assessment – Part 2](Upgrade to see actual info)

Applications missing any step will not be reviewed.

*We use these assessments to ensure you have the essential skills and attention to detail needed to succeed in this role. Only qualified candidates will advance to the interview stage.*

Compensation & Schedule:

- Monthly Salary: PHP 25,000–35,000 (USD $450–$650), depending on experience
- Full-time, remote (night shift for PH applicants; Pacific Time business hours)
- Long-term position with potential for future growth

*We welcome applicants who are serious, organized, and ready to support our growing team!*

WASHINGTON CONSTRUCTION is an equal opportunity employer. We value a diverse team and welcome applicants from all backgrounds.

*Apply now and join a professional, supportive work environment!*
